name: GD Requests
description: A handy interface for creating GD requests

debug-label.name: Debug Label
debug-label.description:
Puts the parameters count into <cc>debug mode</c>.
Shows (children/logged database instances).

text-sanitizing.name: Text Sanitizing
text-sanitizing.description:
Enables text sanitizing for key, value and endpoint input fields.
If disabled, improves performance (especially for big strings), but <cr>can lead to unexpected behavior if you have character bypass</c>!
